channel.title: Virtue ~ Exceeding The Expectations
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/142zbiq.png[/img]
Developer: Ochroid
Forum Link: [url=http://virtue-gaming.com/forum.php]http://virtue-gaming.com/forum.php[/url]
The server Virtue, is going to be a server that outdoes any server that is currently online. I am making this server, to give players of this community, the best gaming experience they can possibly have, on a private server. This server will have so much to do, that even when maxed, they cannot get bored.
Our XP rate on this server is 20X runescape, which is the perfect amount to level up faster than runescape, while feeling a very good sense of accomplishment. The XP rate is designed to give you a small challenge, when maxing out your levels, and gives you a much harder challenge to reach that 200M marker.
This server will be advertised and hosted when finished, and while this is online, my goal is to make everyone, play a server they can have fun on!
After giving it alot of though, people don't like that hard of an economy. The economy of Virtue will be very stable, and will involve alot of skilling/trading. Here is the basic format of what it is going to be.
You can buy base supplies from a shop (seeds for example). With those base supplies, you will have to make the herbs, which will then make the potions. This way, you just can't buy potions, which there is no sense of accomplishment in. This is less strict then my old one, which you would have to actually thieve the seeds, which for a server, is a bit extreme. But I do still want this economy, so there is a very stable market.
In Virtue, we will have something called universal skilling. Which basically means, instead of having a zone designed specifically for skilling, we will make it so you can skill anywhere on Virtue. That means you can roam to anywhere across Virtue, and chop down trees/ mine some rocks depending on the locations in RS.
What this allows a player to do, is get a good feel of real skilling rathe than easy, 5 minute skilling. This will add a level of difficulty when getting those 99's also! [/CENTER]
Media -
[SPOILER="Media"] Summoning - ~~ Familiar Special Attacks 1 - 10: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xtnm_9hmJWw&feature=plcp]Familiar Specials ~ 1-10 - YouTube[/url]
~~ Familiar Special Attacks 11 - 20: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=buBqlpKU1uc&feature=plcp]Summoning Specials ~ 11-20 - YouTube[/url]
~~ Familiar Special Attacks 21 - 30: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6cokC3cI-lI&feature=plcp]Familairs 21-30 - YouTube[/url]
~~ Familiar Special Attacks 31 - 40: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LWwUz1e9vRo&feature=plcp]Familiars 31-40 - YouTube[/url]
~~ Familiar Special Attacks 41 - 50: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=httT7UyiTW0&feature=plcp]Specials 41-50 - YouTube[/url]
~~ Familiar Special Attacks 51 - 60: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OeIifqPDkBQ&feature=plcp]Familairs 51-60 - YouTube[/url]
~~ Familiar Special Attacks 61 - 70: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1yV4z0zu7So&feature=plcp]61-70 Familiars - YouTube[/url]
~~ Familiar Special Attacks 71 - 78: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdL-mIhb40c&feature=plcp]71-78 Familiars - YouTube[/url]
Basic Functions in a nutshell: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XWQKthEpcxc&feature=plcp]Summoning Completed Base - YouTube[/url]
Pouch Creation: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IwMth3xtQZo&feature=plcp]Summoning ~ Pouch Creation Interface - YouTube[/url]
[SPOILER="Dungeoneering Media"] Floor 2 Example: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dee5tObd7_w]Virtue ~ Dungeoneering Example - Floor 2 Complexity 2 - YouTube[/url]
Binding Video: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VaMucTY9KFc]Virtue ~ Binding Items In Dungeon - YouTube[/url]
Correct 120 Dungeoneering (With the correct formula): [IMG]http://puu.sh/G4IE[/img]
Reward Items (All correct level requirements and tokens): [IMG]http://puu.sh/G4DM[/img]
First interface when you click on the ring: [IMG]http://puu.sh/G4rD[/img]
2nd Interface, When you form: [IMG]http://puu.sh/G4s3[/img]
Starting Items (The primal is my binded items, so nobody starts with those ;) ): [IMG]http://puu.sh/G4tf[/img]
In-Game Interface: [IMG]http://puu.sh/G4tu[/img]
Example of Boss (Correct animations, unique specials): [IMG]http://puu.sh/G4A6[/img]
Finish Message: [IMG]http://puu.sh/G4xt[/img]
[SPOILER="Smithing Media"][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gEjn9os0Cmg]Virtue ~ 100% Smithing - YouTube[/url][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Fletching Media"][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5jeuduX0Hw4]Virtue ~ Complete Fletching - YouTube[/url][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Cooking Media"][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4eardwuYPcw]Virtue ~ Complete Cooking - YouTube[/url][/SPOILER]

Imbuing Rings: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ABWm5loiT58]Virtue ~ Imbueing Rings - YouTube[/url]

I'm from rune-server, just posted here so you guys can see media too :)

item.title: Virtue ~ Exceeding The Expectations
item.dc:creator: @ochroid ochroid
item.description:
@ochroid wrote:

request close, I’ll just post an advertsing thread l8er, and Apollo takes 1 minute to load? takes 8 seconds for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Virtue ~ Exceeding The Expectations
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Omer, post:4, topic:453023”]Wow TS you fucking cunt I love you but you’re a real twat sometimes <3
Gotta assume responsibility now that you’re global, eh?

Anyway.
So, sacrificing speed for simplicity? JRuby is dead slow.[/quote]

Agreed. When precompiling JRuby it takes forever, which is why when Apollo starts up, it takes nearly a minute to do so.

I don’t know why there wasn’t an available option to compile script in a different language or perhaps a java content oriented system.

Read full topic

item.title: Virtue ~ Exceeding The Expectations
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Honestly went ahead and just stripped the thread clean.

Keep the flame to a minimum boys. :):)

Read full topic
